alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lee; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:55AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Chickasaw, east central Calhoun, southeastern Pontotoc and southern Lee Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 155 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Houlka, or 11 miles northwest of Houston, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Verona, Shannon, Plantersville, Troy, Houlka, Nettleton, New Houlka, Reid, Palmetto, Leotis, Old Union, Wallfield and George P Cossar State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
